results.content: Very good Vue course for people who already have some familiarity with JavaScript. Covers basically everything that Vue has to offer. For people who are completely new to JavaScript I would first recommend some kind of beginners course, otherwise they might get confused.

response.content: Thanks, Roman for the feedback :) Much appreciated :) Regards, RapidDevPro
